author: Karl Bode
description: Despite all the recent hype about “AI,” the technology still struggles with very basic things and remains prone to significant errors. Which makes it maybe not the best idea to rush the nascent technology into widespread adoption in industries prone to all sorts of deep-rooted problems already (like say, health insurance, or journalism). We’ve already […]
title: Like Apple, Google’s AI News Tech Misinterprets Stories, Generates Gibberish Headlines

author: Molly Buckley
description: A new bill sponsored by Sen. Hawley (R-MO), Sen. Blumenthal (D-CT), Sen. Britt (R-AL), Sen. Warner (D-VA), and Sen. Murphy (D-CT) would require AI chatbots to verify all users’ ages, prohibit minors from using AI tools, and implement steep criminal penalties for chatbots that promote or solicit certain harms. That might sound reasonable at first, but behind […]
title: A Surveillance Mandate Disguised As Child Safety: Why The GUARD Act Won’t Keep Us Safe

author: Mike Masnick
description: The Court of Justice of the EU—likely without realizing it—just completely shit the bed and made it effectively impossible to run any website in the entirety of the EU that hosts user-generated content. Obviously, for decades now, we’ve been talking about issues related to intermediary liability, and what standards are appropriate there. I am an […]
title: EU’s Top Court Just Made It Literally Impossible To Run A User-Generated Content Platform Legally

author: Daily Deal
description: The Ultimate Oracle, SAP and Salesforce Training Bundle has 6 courses to help you brush up on your CRM knowledge. Courses cover database programming languages, data analysis, Recovery Manager, and more. It’s on sale for $25. Note: The Techdirt Deals Store is powered and curated by StackCommerce. A portion of all sales from Techdirt Deals […]
title: Daily Deal: The Ultimate Oracle, SAP And Salesforce Training Bundle

author: Tim Cushing
description: A recent shooting involving a former Afghani US counter-terrorism asset who worked with the CIA (!!!) has become the tragedy the Trump administration apparently needed to go from “consistently racist” to “openly racist.” The wounding of two National Guard troops led directly to the president spending the holiday doing what he always does on holidays: […]
title: Trump Administration Stops Fucking Around On Immigration, Hangs Official ‘Whites Only’ Sign

author: Karl Bode
description: Earlier this year we noted how the Trump administration had cooked up a half-assed wireless phone company. Even calling it a “phone company” was being generous: the branding deal was basically just a licensing agreement and a lazy coat of paint on another, half-assed, MAGA-focused, mobile virtual network operator (MVNO) named Patriot Mobile, which itself just […]
title: The ‘Trump Phone’ Is An Unsurprising No Show Months After Promised Launch Date

author: Timothy Geigner
description: Part of what makes it difficult for the importance of so much of what is happening in the Trump administration to break through to the public mind is that it’s all chaos, all the time. Moving layers deeper to get at specifics can actually make the problem worse, in fact. Take all of our coverage […]
title: RFK Jr., CDC Vaccine Guidance, A New Deputy CDC Director, And Measles In South Carolina
